testcase.name: CT01 - Full cart lifecycle for authenticated user
CT02 - Cancel purchase and return products to stock
CT03 - Prevent creating cart without authentication token
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://serverest.dev' ............................................. passed * def FakerUtils = Java.type('serverest.utils.FakerUtils') ................ passed * def randomProductName = function(){ return FakerUtils.randomProduct() } . passed * def loginPayload = read('classpath:serverest/login/resources/loginPayload.json') . passed * def email = function(){ return FakerUtils.randomEmail() } ............... passed * def cartBody = .......................................................... passed Given path '/carrinhos' ................................................... passed And request cartBody ...................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 401 ........................................................... passed And match response.message == 'Token de acesso ausente, inválido, expirado ou usuário do token não existe mais' . passed
